name: Space Survival Manager
description: Take control of a space ship and guide it through the dangers of space. What lies before you is your home, you have to get there at every cost. To reach your goal you have to redirect, convert and manage your oxygen, power and fuel levels, counter catastrophes and keep your ship intact. To do so you have to act swiftly and smart. Prioritization is key. Assume the challange of pilot in command.
